name: Master Rune of Flight (Temporary)
description: Can only be inscribed on a hammer. Allows the hammer to be thrown and the wielder is treated as having Ranged (Throwing) skill. Hammer has a range of 24 yards and the thrower gains a +30 Ballistic Skill. Hammer returns to the throwerâ€™s hand at the end of his round. Can only be activated once.
